analysis.description:
MainBonus.Withdraw (/unique_chucks/17/0x707784ed2b464474f8fb763c058b33fcf8626db5.sol#777-793) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- acc.transfer(bonus) (/unique_chucks/17/0x707784ed2b464474f8fb763c058b33fcf8626db5.sol#790-792)

MainBonus.MasterWithdraw (/unique_chucks/17/0x707784ed2b464474f8fb763c058b33fcf8626db5.sol#793-799) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- receiver.transfer(bonus) (/unique_chucks/17/0x707784ed2b464474f8fb763c058b33fcf8626db5.sol#796-797)
